Footer.Spam: Size spam göndermeye veya e-postanızı paylaşmaya çalışmayacağız

AboutPage.Description: Şifada, Wedd, işleri yapmanın daha iyi bir yolu olduğuna inanıyor.Müşterilerin satın alınmasından çok kazanıldığı daha değerli bir yol.Biz o konuda takıntılı tutkulu ve misyonumuz insanların bunu başarmasına yardımcı olmaktır.Arama motoru optimizasyonuna odaklanıyoruz.Büyük pazarlamanın anlaşılacağı ve en az şeffaf yönlerinden biridir ve bunu bir fırsat olarak görüyoruz.Yazılım, eğitimimiz ve topluluğumuzda herkes için SEO'yu basitleştirmek için heyecanlıyız.
AboutPage.Founding: İyileşme, 2021'de Payam Abubakr tarafından kuruldu. Online İyileşme olarak adlandırıldı ve bir blog olarak başladı ve dünyanın terapistlerinden bazılarının araştırma ve fikirlerini paylaştığı bir blog ve çevrimiçi bir topluluk olarak başladı.Yeni başlayanların terapisine ve ilk çalışmamıza yönelik rehberini başlattık ve bu endüstri uzmanlığının merkezi küçük bir danışmanlık firmasına dönüştü ve bugünün çevrimiçi terapisti yaratmamızı sağladı!

AddNewCard.CardThankYou1: Yeni ödeme yönteminiz incelendiğinde, kartınız onaylandığında yakında bir e-posta alacaksınız.
AddNewCard.CardThankYou2: Aksi takdirde, size neyin yanlış gittiğini ve yeni bir kart ekleneceğini söyleyen bir bildirim alacaksınız.
AddNewCard.CardSure: Lütfen girdiğiniz tüm bilgilerin kart kayıt bilgilerinizle aynı olduğundan emin olun.
AddNewCard.Name: Kartta isim

Booking.Title1: let’s match you with the right therapist
Booking.Subtitle1: Please fill out this short questionnaire to provide some general and anonymous background about you and the issues you'd like to deal with in online therapy. It would help us match you with the most suitable therapist for you.
Booking.Subtitle2: Please specify (in a few sentences) why you'd like counseling. This will give your counselor a good understanding of where to start.
Booking.Subtitle3: Click Submit if you are sure of all your choices.
Booking.Subtitle4: You will receive an email guiding you to book a date and time soon.
Booking.Q1: What type of counseling are you looking for?
Booking.Q3: Have you ever been in therapy before?
Booking.Q4: Are there any specific quality that you would prefer in a counselor?
Booking.Q5: Are there any issue that you would like to focus on?
Booking.Aware: Please be aware that this action will cost you a ticket!
Booking.Notice: you will receive a confirmation email soon. please keep an eye on your mail.

Open.Title: CAREERS AT HEALING
Open.Subtitle: Be a part of making people feel better.
Open.Intro: Our SEO software cuts through mountains of data to surface critical insights. We build and maintain systems that process massive amounts of data (we're talking 36 trillion records per day and multiple petabytes of storage.) We model transparent and empathetic marketing for the world. We educate our community, making every effort to help them improve their skill. And we do it all by fostering a culture that encourages accountability, empathy, and transparency.
Open.Question: What role will you play?
Open.HiringIntro: To build the very best SEO tools, we need a workforce that reflects the diversity of our communities and customers. We want Online Therapy to be a place where everyone feels welcome and engaged, bar none. It's our mission and promise to interview a diverse and representative slate of candidates before making an offer for our open roles.
Open.Instruct: Please send us an email with the application title as the subject with an attached CV in PDF format at:

Edit.Alert: Please fill all the fields with correct and valid details to complete your profile.

HomePage.CardAlert: Please Add a Payment Method in Profile Settings First!
HomePage.CompleteAlert: Please Complete Your Profile in Profile Settings First!
HomePage.CallText: Feeling ready to start a conversation? Give your therapist a voice call and talk your heart out!
HomePage.ChatText: Need to talk to someone? Come have a chat with your therapist!
HomePage.VideoText: For better experience therapists recommend video calls, but always remember that its a choice!
HomePage.Therapist: Professional, licensed, and vetted therapists that you can trust
HomePage.TherapistInfo: Tap into the world's largest network of licensed, accredited, and experienced therapists who can help you with a range of issues including depression, anxiety, relationships, trauma, grief, and more. with our therapists, you get the same professionalism and quality you would expect from an in-office therapist, but with the ability to communicate whenever and however you want.
HomePage.Explain: purchase tickets that can be used to book appointments!
HomePage.Interest: Interested in joining our mental health platform? You decide your schedule and how much you want to work, we’ll take care of the client referrals and billing details!

Purchase.Subtitle: Please select the card you want to buy the tickets with
Purchase.Confirm1: Click confirm to use the selected card to purchase

Require.Explain: Over 10,000 people sign up on Healing every day looking for a counselor to help with life’s challenges. Healing can be your main source of income (full time) or a supplement to your current work.
Require.Worry: No need to worry about costs from acquiring clients, billing, support or operations. Let us handle the fees and paperwork so you can focus on what you do best!
Require.License: Licensed by a State Board to provide counseling
Require.Exp: Experience in counseling for adults, couples, and/or teens

Cards.Support: We only support cards as a payment method at the moment!
